Package: %1$s
Version: %2$s

Hey,
I have some comments regarding your app:

General 
 • You can copy generated code from the “Info” or share it (with pictures) from the action bar. 
 • Long pressing the color picker will give you more picker types. 
 • Tapping on the original image (left/bottom) will give you the opportunity to swap the image. 
 • Long pressing the original image (right/top) will reset the default image. 
 • Tapping on the preview image (right/top) will reset the settings.


Lighting Color Filter 
 • Tapping on the color preview will reset the color.


Porter/Duff Color Filter 
 • Use (semi-)transparent images (png/gif) for best effects. 
 • Tapping on the color preview will reset the color. 
 • ADD/OVERLAY is supported only above Android 3.0


Color Matrix Color Filter 
 • The little × on the Color Matrix will reset just the matrix. 
 • You can change the multiplication order of the matrices by clicking on the multiplication signs or by drag & dropping the R and S boxes.


Palette 
 • The displayed Swatches and their order can be changed with the dropdown below the slider.

What is this application? 
This application was made so that Android developers can test out what a Color Filter applied to an image will look like without the need for coding. Once they are satisfied with the results it is easy to copy the code and just use it in their apps.


How can I leave feedback? What is feedback? 
Tap on the link below the application name/version in the About. 
Feel free to send any kind of comment, request, suggestion, error report; just about any thought regarding this application.


I don't like the built-in keyboards! 
You can turn them off in the Settings, and feel free to leave some feedback about it!
